root.name: Mario Artist: Paint Studio
root.description: Overview:Paint Studio is a launch title for the Nintendo 64 DD. Released on December 1, 1999, it is often mistaken for Mario Paint. Players can upload images from their Game Boy Camera to the DD. Using the Capture Cartridge, players can also upload videos to color or edit. It was bundled with the N64 Mouse and has a unique four-player mode.

similar_games.game: BS Mario Paint: Yuu Shou Naizou Ban
